0.1.name: wordpress/bookx
0.1.description: BookX creates an easy way to give your site visitors a peek at your recommended books. Using only ISBN numbers, it gets the information from Barnes and Noble (http://www.bn.com) and stores the information locally to both speed up the response time, but also to not bog down their servers with repetetive requests. BookX creates a widget for your sidebar, a list view, and detail view, all customizable from the easy to use admin interface.
